specialAbilities.name: Universal Weapon Proficiency
specialAbilities.description: You are trained in all non-exotic weapon groups: Bolt, Chain, Melta, Plasma, Power, Flame, Primitive, Las, Solid Projectile, Thrown, and Launcher. You do not suffer the -20 untrained penalty when using these weapons.
